verses.verse: וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּשְׁכָּ֥ן <WH4908> the tabernacle תַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> Moreover thou shalt make עֶ֣שֶׂר <WH6235> [with] ten יְרִיעֹ֑ת <WH3407> curtains שֵׁ֣שׁ <WH8336> linen מָשְׁזָ֗ר <WH7806> [of] fine twined וּתְכֵ֤לֶת <WH8504> and blue וְאַרְגָּמָן֙ <WH713> and purple וְתֹלַ֣עַת <WH8438> oppressor שָׁנִ֔י <WH8144> and scarlet כְּרֻבִ֛ים <WH3742> [with] cherubims מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <WH4639> work חֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH2803> of cunning תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> shalt thou make אֹתָֽם׃ <WH853>

אֹ֣רֶךְ ׀ <WH753> The length הַיְרִיעָ֣ה <WH3407> curtain הָֽאַחַ֗ת <WH259> of one שְׁמֹנֶ֤ה <WH8083> [shall be] eight וְעֶשְׂרִים֙ <WH6242> and twenty בָּֽאַמָּ֔ה <WH520> cubits וְרֹ֙חַב֙ <WH7341> and the breadth אַרְבַּ֣ע <WH702> four בָּאַמָּ֔ה <WH520> cubits הַיְרִיעָ֖ה <WH3407> curtain הָאֶחָ֑ת <WH259> of one מִדָּ֥ה <WH4060> measure אַחַ֖ת <WH259> shall have one לְכָל־ <WH3605> all הַיְרִיעֹֽת׃ <WH3407> and every one of the curtains

חֲמֵ֣שׁ <WH2568> The five הַיְרִיעֹ֗ת <WH3407> curtains תִּֽהְיֶ֙יןָ֙ <WH1961> become חֹֽבְרֹ֔ת <WH2266> shall be coupled together אִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> one אֶל־ <WH413> to אֲחֹתָ֑הּ <WH269> to another וְחָמֵ֤שׁ <WH2568> and [other] five יְרִיעֹת֙ <WH3407> curtains חֹֽבְרֹ֔ת <WH2266> [shall be] coupled אִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> one אֶל־ <WH413> to אֲחֹתָֽהּ׃ <WH269> to another

וְעָשִׂ֜יתָ <WH6213> And thou shalt make לֻֽלְאֹ֣ת <WH3924> loops תְּכֵ֗לֶת <WH8504> of blue עַ֣ל <WH5921> on שְׂפַ֤ת <WH8193> upon the edge הַיְרִיעָה֙ <WH3407> curtain הָאֶחָ֔ת <WH259> of the one מִקָּצָ֖ה <WH7098> from the selvedge בַּחֹבָ֑רֶת <WH2279> in the coupling וְכֵ֤ן <WH3651> and likewise תַּעֲשֶׂה֙ <WH6213> and likewise shalt thou make בִּשְׂפַ֣ת <WH8193> edge הַיְרִיעָ֔ה <WH3407> of [another] curtain הַקִּ֣יצוֹנָ֔ה <WH7020> in the uttermost בַּמַּחְבֶּ֖רֶת <WH4225> in the coupling הַשֵּׁנִֽית׃ <WH8145> of the second

חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <WH2572> Fifty לֻֽלָאֹ֗ת <WH3924> loops תַּעֲשֶׂה֮ <WH6213> shalt thou make בַּיְרִיעָ֣ה <WH3407> curtain הָאֶחָת֒ <WH259> in the one וַחֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <WH2572> and fifty לֻֽלָאֹ֗ת <WH3924> loops תַּעֲשֶׂה֙ <WH6213> shalt thou make בִּקְצֵ֣ה <WH7097> in the edge הַיְרִיעָ֔ה <WH3407> of the curtain אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> after בַּמַּחְבֶּ֣רֶת <WH4225> that [is] in the coupling הַשֵּׁנִ֑ית <WH8145> of the second מַקְבִּילֹת֙ <WH6901> may take hold הַלֻּ֣לָאֹ֔ת <WH3924> that the loops אִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> one אֶל־ <WH413> about אֲחֹתָֽהּ׃ <WH269> of another

וְעָשִׂ֕יתָ <WH6213> And thou shalt make חֲמִשִּׁ֖ים <WH2572> fifty קַרְסֵ֣י <WH7165> taches זָהָ֑ב <WH2091> of gold וְחִבַּרְתָּ֨ <WH2266> and couple אֶת־ <WH853> הַיְרִיעֹ֜ת <WH3407> the curtains אִשָּׁ֤ה <WH802> to one אֶל־ <WH413> about אֲחֹתָהּ֙ <WH269> with בַּקְּרָסִ֔ים <WH7165> the taches וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן <WH4908> tabernacle אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> and it shall be one פ

וְעָשִׂ֙יתָ֙ <WH6213> And thou shalt make יְרִיעֹ֣ת <WH3407> curtains עִזִּ֔ים <WH5795> [of] goats' לְאֹ֖הֶל <WH168> [hair] to be a covering עַל־ <WH5921> over הַמִּשְׁכָּ֑ן <WH4908> upon the tabernacle עַשְׁתֵּי־ <WH6249> eleven עֶשְׂרֵ֥ה <WH6240> ten יְרִיעֹ֖ת <WH3407> curtains תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> shalt thou make אֹתָֽם׃ <WH853>

אֹ֣רֶךְ ׀ <WH753> The length הַיְרִיעָ֣ה <WH3407> curtain הָֽאַחַ֗ת <WH259> of one שְׁלֹשִׁים֙ <WH7970> [shall be] thirty בָּֽאַמָּ֔ה <WH520> cubits וְרֹ֙חַב֙ <WH7341> and the breadth אַרְבַּ֣ע <WH702> four בָּאַמָּ֔ה <WH520> cubits הַיְרִיעָ֖ה <WH3407> curtain הָאֶחָ֑ת <WH259> of one מִדָּ֣ה <WH4060> measure אַחַ֔ת <WH259> [shall be all] of one לְעַשְׁתֵּ֥י <WH6249> eleven עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <WH6240> ten יְרִיעֹֽת׃ <WH3407> curtains

וְחִבַּרְתָּ֞ <WH2266> And thou shalt couple אֶת־ <WH853> חֲמֵ֤שׁ <WH2568> five הַיְרִיעֹת֙ <WH3407> curtains לְבָ֔ד <WH905> themselves וְאֶת־ <WH853> שֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> by themselves and six הַיְרִיעֹ֖ת <WH3407> curtains לְבָ֑ד <WH905> themselves וְכָפַלְתָּ֙ <WH3717> by themselves and shalt double אֶת־ <WH853> הַיְרִיעָ֣ה <WH3407> curtain הַשִּׁשִּׁ֔ית <WH8345> the sixth אֶל־ <WH413> about מ֖וּל <WH4136> against פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> the front הָאֹֽהֶל׃ <WH168> of the tabernacle

וְעָשִׂ֜יתָ <WH6213> And thou shalt make חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <WH2572> fifty לֻֽלָאֹ֗ת <WH3924> loops עַ֣ל <WH5921> on שְׂפַ֤ת <WH8193> on the edge הַיְרִיעָה֙ <WH3407> curtain הָֽאֶחָ֔ת <WH259> of the one הַקִּיצֹנָ֖ה <WH7020> [that is] outmost בַּחֹבָ֑רֶת <WH2279> in the coupling וַחֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <WH2572> and fifty לֻֽלָאֹ֗ת <WH3924> loops עַ֚ל <WH5921> on שְׂפַ֣ת <WH8193> in the edge הַיְרִיעָ֔ה <WH3407> of the curtain הַחֹבֶ֖רֶת <WH2279> which coupleth הַשֵּׁנִֽית׃ <WH8145> the second

וְעָשִׂ֛יתָ <WH6213> And thou shalt make קַרְסֵ֥י <WH7165> taches נְחֹ֖שֶׁת <WH5178> of brass חֲמִשִּׁ֑ים <WH2572> fifty וְהֵבֵאתָ֤ <WH935> and put אֶת־ <WH853> הַקְּרָסִים֙ <WH7165> the taches בַּלֻּ֣לָאֹ֔ת <WH3924> into the loops וְחִבַּרְתָּ֥ <WH2266> and couple אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֹ֖הֶל <WH168> the tent וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> will be a אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> together that it may be one

וְסֶ֙רַח֙ <WH5629> And the remnant הָעֹדֵ֔ף <WH5736> that remaineth בִּירִיעֹ֖ת <WH3407> of the curtains הָאֹ֑הֶל <WH168> of the tent חֲצִ֤י <WH2677> the half הַיְרִיעָה֙ <WH3407> curtain הָעֹדֶ֔פֶת <WH5736> that remaineth תִּסְרַ֕ח <WH5628> shall hang עַ֖ל <WH5921> over אֲחֹרֵ֥י <WH268> over the backside הַמִּשְׁכָּֽן׃ <WH4908> of the tabernacle

וְהָאַמָּ֨ה <WH520> And a cubit מִזֶּ֜ה <WH2088> on the one side וְהָאַמָּ֤ה <WH520> and a cubit מִזֶּה֙ <WH2088> side בָּעֹדֵ֔ף <WH5736> on the other side of that which remaineth בְּאֹ֖רֶךְ <WH753> in the length יְרִיעֹ֣ת <WH3407> of the curtains הָאֹ֑הֶל <WH168> of the tent יִהְיֶ֨ה <WH1961> become סָר֜וּחַ <WH5628> it shall hang עַל־ <WH5921> over צִדֵּ֧י <WH6654> over the sides הַמִּשְׁכָּ֛ן <WH4908> of the tabernacle מִזֶּ֥ה <WH2088> the other וּמִזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> one לְכַסֹּתֽוֹ׃ <WH3680> on this side and on that side to cover

וְעָשִׂ֤יתָ <WH6213> And thou shalt make מִכְסֶה֙ <WH4372> a covering לָאֹ֔הֶל <WH168> for the tent עֹרֹ֥ת <WH5785> skins אֵילִ֖ם <WH352> [of] rams' מְאָדָּמִ֑ים <WH119> dyed red וּמִכְסֵ֛ה <WH4372> and a covering עֹרֹ֥ת <WH5785> skins תְּחָשִׁ֖ים <WH8476> [of] badgers' מִלְמָֽעְלָה׃ <WH4605> above פ

וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <WH6213> And thou shalt make אֶת־ <WH853> הַקְּרָשִׁ֖ים <WH7175> boards לַמִּשְׁכָּ֑ן <WH4908> for the tabernacle עֲצֵ֥י <WH6086> wood שִׁטִּ֖ים <WH7848> [of] shittim עֹמְדִֽים׃ <WH5975> standing up

עֶ֥שֶׂר <WH6235> Ten אַמּ֖וֹת <WH520> cubits אֹ֣רֶךְ <WH753> [shall be] the length הַקָּ֑רֶשׁ <WH7175> of a board וְאַמָּה֙ <WH520> and a cubit וַחֲצִ֣י <WH2677> and a half הָֽאַמָּ֔ה <WH520> cubits רֹ֖חַב <WH7341> [shall be] the breadth הַקֶּ֥רֶשׁ <WH7175> board הָאֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> of one

שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> Two יָד֗וֹת <WH3027> tenons לַקֶּ֙רֶשׁ֙ <WH7175> board הָאֶחָ֔ד <WH259> [shall there be] in one מְשֻׁלָּבֹ֔ת <WH7947> set in order אִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> one אֶל־ <WH413> about אֲחֹתָ֑הּ <WH269> against another כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> thus תַּעֲשֶׂ֔ה <WH6213> thus shalt thou make לְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> for all קַרְשֵׁ֥י <WH7175> for all the boards הַמִּשְׁכָּֽן׃ <WH4908> of the tabernacle

וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <WH6213> And thou shalt make אֶת־ <WH853> הַקְּרָשִׁ֖ים <WH7175> the boards לַמִּשְׁכָּ֑ן <WH4908> for the tabernacle עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <WH6242> twenty קֶ֔רֶשׁ <WH7175> boards לִפְאַ֖ת <WH6285> side נֶ֥גְבָּה <WH5045> on the south תֵימָֽנָה׃ <WH8486> southward

וְאַרְבָּעִים֙ <WH705> forty אַדְנֵי־ <WH134> sockets כֶ֔סֶף <WH3701> of silver תַּעֲשֶׂ֕ה <WH6213> And thou shalt make תַּ֖חַת <WH8478> under עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <WH6242> under the twenty הַקָּ֑רֶשׁ <WH7175> boards שְׁנֵ֨י <WH8147> two אֲדָנִ֜ים <WH134> sockets תַּֽחַת־ <WH8478> under הַקֶּ֤רֶשׁ <WH7175> board הָאֶחָד֙ <WH259> under one לִשְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> for his two יְדֹתָ֔יו <WH3027> tenons וּשְׁנֵ֧י <WH8147> and two אֲדָנִ֛ים <WH134> sockets תַּֽחַת־ <WH8478> under הַקֶּ֥רֶשׁ <WH7175> board הָאֶחָ֖ד <WH259> under another לִשְׁתֵּ֥י <WH8147> for his two יְדֹתָֽיו׃ <WH3027> tenons

וּלְצֶ֧לַע <WH6763> side הַמִּשְׁכָּ֛ן <WH4908> of the tabernacle הַשֵּׁנִ֖ית <WH8145> And for the second לִפְאַ֣ת <WH6285> side צָפ֑וֹן <WH6828> on the north עֶשְׂרִ֖ים <WH6242> [there shall be] twenty קָֽרֶשׁ׃ <WH7175> boards

וְאַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> And their forty אַדְנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH134> sockets כָּ֑סֶף <WH3701> [of] silver שְׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> two אֲדָנִ֗ים <WH134> sockets תַּ֚חַת <WH8478> under הַקֶּ֣רֶשׁ <WH7175> board הָֽאֶחָ֔ד <WH259> under one וּשְׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> and two אֲדָנִ֔ים <WH134> sockets תַּ֖חַת <WH8478> under הַקֶּ֥רֶשׁ <WH7175> board הָאֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> under another
וּֽלְיַרְכְּתֵ֥י <WH3411> And for the sides הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן <WH4908> of the tabernacle יָ֑מָּה <WH3220> westward תַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> thou shalt make שִׁשָּׁ֥ה <WH8337> six קְרָשִֽׁים׃ <WH7175> boards

וּשְׁנֵ֤י <WH8147> And two קְרָשִׁים֙ <WH7175> boards תַּעֲשֶׂ֔ה <WH6213> shalt thou make לִמְקֻצְעֹ֖ת <WH4742> for the corners הַמִּשְׁכָּ֑ן <WH4908> of the tabernacle בַּיַּרְכָתָֽיִם׃ <WH3411> in the two sides

וְיִֽהְי֣וּ <WH1961> shall form תֹֽאֲמִים֮ <WH8382> And they shall be coupled מִלְּמַטָּה֒ <WH4295> together beneath וְיַחְדָּ֗ו <WH3162> together יִהְי֤וּ <WH1961> shall form תַמִּים֙ <WH8535> shall be complete עַל־ <WH5921> unto רֹאשׁ֔וֹ <WH7218> above the head אֶל־ <WH413> about הַטַּבַּ֖עַת <WH2885> ring הָאֶחָ֑ת <WH259> of it unto one כֵּ֚ן <WH3651> thus יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> shall form לִשְׁנֵיהֶ֔ם <WH8147> thus shall it be for them both לִשְׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> they shall be for the two הַמִּקְצֹעֹ֖ת <WH4740> corners יִהְיֽוּ׃ <WH1961> shall form

וְהָיוּ֙ <WH1961> become שְׁמֹנָ֣ה <WH8083> And they shall be eight קְרָשִׁ֔ים <WH7175> boards וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֣ם <WH134> and their sockets כֶּ֔סֶף <WH3701> [of] silver שִׁשָּׁ֥ה <WH8337> six עָשָׂ֖ר <WH6240> teen אֲדָנִ֑ים <WH134> sockets שְׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> two אֲדָנִ֗ים <WH134> sockets תַּ֚חַת <WH8478> under הַקֶּ֣רֶשׁ <WH7175> board הָאֶחָ֔ד <WH259> under one וּשְׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> and two אֲדָנִ֔ים <WH134> sockets תַּ֖חַת <WH8478> under הַקֶּ֥רֶשׁ <WH7175> board הָאֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> under another

וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <WH6213> And thou shalt make בְרִיחִ֖ם <WH1280> bars עֲצֵ֣י <WH6086> wood שִׁטִּ֑ים <WH7848> [of] shittim חֲמִשָּׁ֕ה <WH2568> five לְקַרְשֵׁ֥י <WH7175> for the boards צֶֽלַע־ <WH6763> side הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן <WH4908> of the tabernacle הָאֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> of the one

וַחֲמִשָּׁ֣ה <WH2568> And five בְרִיחִ֔ם <WH1280> bars לְקַרְשֵׁ֥י <WH7175> for the boards צֶֽלַע־ <WH6763> side הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן <WH4908> of the tabernacle הַשֵּׁנִ֑ית <WH8145> of the other וַחֲמִשָּׁ֣ה <WH2568> and five בְרִיחִ֗ם <WH1280> bars לְקַרְשֵׁי֙ <WH7175> for the boards צֶ֣לַע <WH6763> of the side הַמִּשְׁכָּ֔ן <WH4908> of the tabernacle לַיַּרְכָתַ֖יִם <WH3411> for the two sides יָֽמָּה׃ <WH3220> westward

וְהַבְּרִ֥יחַ <WH1280> bar הַתִּיכֹ֖ן <WH8484> And the middle בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> in the midst הַקְּרָשִׁ֑ים <WH7175> of the boards מַבְרִ֕חַ <WH1272> shall reach מִן־ <WH4480> from הַקָּצֶ֖ה <WH7097> from end אֶל־ <WH413> to הַקָּצֶֽה׃ <WH7097> to end

וְֽאֶת־ <WH853> הַקְּרָשִׁ֞ים <WH7175> the boards תְּצַפֶּ֣ה <WH6823> And thou shalt overlay זָהָ֗ב <WH2091> with gold וְאֶת־ <WH853> טַבְּעֹֽתֵיהֶם֙ <WH2885> their rings תַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> and make זָהָ֔ב <WH2091> [of] gold בָּתִּ֖ים <WH1004> [for] places לַבְּרִיחִ֑ם <WH1280> for the bars וְצִפִּיתָ֥ <WH6823> and thou shalt overlay אֶת־ <WH853> הַבְּרִיחִ֖ם <WH1280> the bars זָהָֽב׃ <WH2091> with gold
